LanguageData.SkavenKnowColonistDied.stages.0.label: colonist died
LanguageData.SkavenPawnWithGoodOpinionDied.stages.0.d: That one was not so bad.
LanguageData.SkavenMySonDied.stages.0.label: my son {0} died
LanguageData.SkavenMySonDied.stages.0.description: Son is dead. He was not strong enough.
LanguageData.SkavenMyDaughterDied.stages.0.label: my daughter {0} died
LanguageData.SkavenMyDaughterDied.stages.0.descriptio: Daugher is dead. She was not strong enough.

LanguageData.SkavenMyLoverDied.stages.0.label: my lover {0} died
LanguageData.SkavenMyLoverDied.stages.0.description: Lover is dead Our plans are lost.

LanguageData.SkavenGotMarried.stages.0.label: got married to {0}
LanguageData.SkavenGotMarried.stages.0.description: The plans we will brew! The deeds we shall do!
LanguageData.SkavenAttendedWedding.stages.0.label: attended wedding
LanguageData.SkavenAttendedWedding.stages.0.descripti: What plans will these two brew? What deeds shall they do?
LanguageData.SkavenAttendedParty.stages.0.label: attended party
LanguageData.SkavenAttendedParty.stages.0.description: So many secrets reveals themself in these gatherings.
LanguageData.SkavenSleepDisturbed.stages.0.label: disturbed sleep
LanguageData.SkavenNewColonyOptimism.stages.0.label: initial optimism
LanguageData.SkavenNewColonyOptimism.stages.0.descrip: So inviting. Such promise this new burrow has.
LanguageData.SkavenNewColonyHope.stages.0.label: initial hope
LanguageData.SkavenNewColonyHope.stages.0.description: This already feels better than the other burrows.
LanguageData.SkavenMyOrganHarvested.stages.0.label: my organ harvested
LanguageData.SkavenMyOrganHarvested.stages.0.descript: Watch your back! You will rue this.
LanguageData.SkavenWasImprisoned.stages.0.label: was imprisoned
LanguageData.SkavenKnowBuriedInSarcophagus.stages.0.d: Such a extravagant thing to do.
LanguageData.SkavenWitnessedDeathFamily.stages.0.desc: I saw the brood thinning out.
LanguageData.SkavenDefeatedHostileFactionLeader.stage: I took them down! The honour is mine!
LanguageData.SkavenInsultedMood.stages.0.label: insulted
LanguageData.SkavenKindWordsMood.stages.0.label: kind words
LanguageData.SkavenKindWordsMood.stages.0.description: Hoh! What favour do you curry.
LanguageData.SkavenFailedRomanceAttemptOnMeLowOpinion: What sinister plan have they hidden.
LanguageData.SkavenBrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.label: broken up with by {0}
LanguageData.SkavenBrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.descrip: They know my plans! My secrets!
LanguageData.SkavenCheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.label: cheated on by {0}
LanguageData.SkavenCheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.descripti: They cheat me! No one cheats me!
LanguageData.SkavenDivorcedMeMood.stages.0.label: divorced by {0}
LanguageData.SkavenDivorcedMeMood.stages.0.descriptio: The plans are ruined. We have to make new ones!
LanguageData.SkavenRejectedMyProposalMood.stages.0.de: You! You are ruining the plans.
LanguageData.SkavenBondedAnimalLost.stages.0.label: bonded animal {0} lost
LanguageData.SkavenFamilyLost.stages.0.label: Family {0} lost
